name: Max Crowdfund
description: Max Property Group is an international property investment company with their head office in Rotterdam, the Netherlands. Their activities include property management, buying-, selling- and renting out of property and they structure and manage property funds and run a property investment academy. They have also developed a property investment crowdfunding platform on the blockchain. The Max Property Group blockchain is a child chain on Ardor and uses the MPG token as a currency to pay for transactions, such as listing property, creating an asset, buying and selling investments and renting out property.
